[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@genesislcap/foundation-events](./foundation-events.md) &gt; [targetChecked](./foundation-events.targetchecked.md)

## targetChecked variable

**Signature:**

```typescript
targetChecked: ValueGetter
```

## Example


```ts
import { targetChecked } from '@genesislcap/foundation-events';
...
<${checkboxTag}
  ?checked="${(x) => x.store.formEntry.showPasswords}"
  @change="${(x, c) => x.$emit('auth-showPasswords-changed', targetChecked(c))}"
  name="show-passwords"
  data-test-id="show-passwords"
>
  Show Passwords
</${checkboxTag}>
```
